0: Great place to take the family although we opted for the family state room it was so loud from the steam punk convention above my daughters room she had to stay in our bed
The tour of the ship was fun and the kids loved exploring the engine room and seeing the ships gigantic propeller
The room was very comfortable clean and roomy a First Class Stateroom in the day

The Queen Mary in her faded glory is a great to visit for historical interest but you are missing the boat if you expect good customer service clean rooms and no theft included in the 200 per night room charge plus daily fees
Beds were super comfy and a bath in the huge tub was a royal treat
Very elegant and comfortable rooms also and staff was very attentive
Had a lovely time all the staff were very friendly and the room was clean
The elegance was uplifting I was tired after traveling from the east coast my room was cozy the bed was very comfortable nice soft pillows ice machine nearby
We booked the King George suite about 10 sq ft of space
Just stayed 2 nights in a lovely twin twin deluxe room on the beautiful Queen Mary
1: My only complaint is that the 6 pastry basket was literally two 2 mini croissants
Anyway the room was good and luckily we did not need to sleep before 1 am when the event finished as our room overlooked the hullabaloo
It would be nice to have coffee drinks service in the lounge on the port side of the observation deck where the piano is located
Harbour view is probably worth buying
I am a travel agent so I would have expected a room that exceeded my expectations
Nice historic stay however the room was a bit cramped and slightly dirty
But the bedding was amazing lol The bathroom was semi dated and the hose did not work
I stayed there with two friends each in our own room
Everything was booked as a package so I think we had a deluxe stateroom but I am not certain
The worst hotel ever the most disgusting room I ever seen in the hotel FYI it was upgraded room
2: Hotel service was great but rooms are washed out
This bar had an excellent view and tastey appetizers freshly baked pretzel bites with the brie cheese are a must
The actual rooms are quite good
Very nice peaple very clean room
Walking the decks gives a true sense of that yesterday from days long gone
You can easily spend 3 hours just wondering the decks
Very cool layout in the rooms
We were going on a cruise and it was nice to stay so close and I was able to get 3 in a room
The rooms are well taken care of and the service is great
